mapper.select: /* MsgManageMapper.getMsgManageList */ SELECT A.MSG_GRP_CD, A.MSG_GRP_NM, NVL(B.MSG_GRP_CNT, 0) AS MSG_GRP_CNT FROM ( SELECT hmt.MSG_GRP_CD, hmt.MSG_GRP_NM FROM HCS_MSGGR_T hmt WHERE 1=1 AND hmt.OGN_CD = #{orgnCd} ) A, ( SELECT hst.MSG_GRP_CD, COUNT(hst.SEQ_NO) AS MSG_GRP_CNT FROM HCS_SMSMS_T hst WHERE 1=1 AND hst.OGN_CD = #{orgnCd} GROUP BY hst.MSG_GRP_CD ) B WHERE 1=1 AND B.MSG_GRP_CD (+)= A.MSG_GRP_CD ORDER BY A.MSG_GRP_CD
mapper.insert: /* MsgManageMapper.getMsgManageSaveInsert */ INSERT INTO HCS_MSGGR_T ( OGN_CD, MSG_GRP_CD, MSG_GRP_NM, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) VALUES ( #{orgnCd}, #{msgGrpCd}, #{msgGrpNm}, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} )

/* MsgManageMapper.getMsgManageDtlSaveInsert */ INSERT INTO HCS_SMSMS_T ( OGN_CD, MSG_GRP_CD, SEQ_NO, TITLE, MESSAGE, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) VALUES ( #{orgnCd}, #{msgGrpCd}, #{seqNo}, #{title}, #{content}, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} )

/* MsgManageMapper.getMsgManageStoreRegistSaveInsert */ MERGE INTO HCS_MSGGR_T A USING ( SELECT #{storeCd} AS OGN_CD, MSG_GRP_CD, MSG_GRP_NM, #{regDt} AS REG_DT, #{regId} AS REG_ID, #{modDt} AS MOD_DT, #{modId} AS MOD_ID FROM HCS_MSGGR_T WHERE 1=1 AND OGN_CD = #{orgnCd} ) B ON ( A.OGN_CD = B.OGN_CD AND A.MSG_GRP_CD = B.MSG_GRP_CD ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET MSG_GRP_NM = B.MSG_GRP_NM, MOD_DT = B.MOD_DT, MOD_ID = B.MOD_ID WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.OGN_CD, A.MSG_GRP_CD, A.MSG_GRP_NM, A.REG_DT, A.REG_ID, A.MOD_DT, A.MOD_ID ) VALUES ( B.OGN_CD, B.MSG_GRP_CD, B.MSG_GRP_NM, B.REG_DT, B.REG_ID, B.MOD_DT, B.MOD_ID )

/* MsgManageMapper.getMsgManageStoreRegistDtlSaveInsert */ MERGE INTO HCS_SMSMS_T A USING ( SELECT #{storeCd} AS OGN_CD, MSG_GRP_CD, SEQ_NO, TITLE, MESSAGE, #{regDt} AS REG_DT, #{regId} AS REG_ID, #{modDt} AS MOD_DT, #{modId} AS MOD_ID FROM HCS_SMSMS_T WHERE 1=1 AND OGN_CD = #{orgnCd} ) B ON ( A.OGN_CD = B.OGN_CD AND A.MSG_GRP_CD = B.MSG_GRP_CD AND A.SEQ_NO = B.SEQ_NO ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET TITLE = B.TITLE, MESSAGE = B.MESSAGE, MOD_DT = B.MOD_DT, MOD_ID = B.MOD_ID WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.OGN_CD, A.MSG_GRP_CD, A.SEQ_NO, A.TITLE, A.MESSAGE, A.REG_DT, A.REG_ID, A.MOD_DT, A.MOD_ID ) VALUES ( B.OGN_CD, B.MSG_GRP_CD, B.SEQ_NO, B.TITLE, B.MESSAGE, B.REG_DT, B.REG_ID, B.MOD_DT, B.MOD_ID )
